description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooker Pumpkin Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow Cooker Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off slow cooker. Using a stick blender, blend mixture, until smooth. Stir in 1/3 cup cream and season. Ladle soup into bowls, drizzle over remaining cream over soup, scatter over chives and serve with bread.
